title: Go 1.5 periodic big GC pauses
body:
Hi go Team, when i used go 1.4 my GC looks http://joxi.ru/Vm6yyL6tLON8rZ
when i use go 1.5 first time GC pauses is really fantastic - less than 1 million ns, but sometimes i see that picture http://joxi.ru/52a11b5CpLww20
i tried profile cpu and memory, but did not see anything strange, could you advice what else i can check to fix that problem.

Thank you
